name: Curse Of The Faceless
description:
Curse Of The Faceless is a game whose story revolves around people not having faces. Most of it is explained at the beginning of the game and some of it at the current ending point. The idea came by thinking that when you walk you don't remember the faces of the people you see on the street. Even so, everyone has a different personality. Eventually this will be addressed in-depth as the development process continue(if it even does). Give it a try!

We have:

-cool Australian gods

-cool Australian people

-simple puzzles

-simple combat system

-neat map

-edgy wizard boss

-poorly made cutscenes

-various tools, equipment and consumables

-unfair merchants

-mythril that doesn't actually look like mythril

-deers and foxes

-a dank tutorial map

We don't have:

-faces for people

-some other stuff

Approx system requirements(based on the team's weakest build):

processor: quad-core 2.6+ ghz

ram: 8 gb

video card: gtx 950 with 2 gb vram

disk space: 4 gb

Although it could probably run on less.
